scripts.build: npm run prepare:gnosis && npx graph build
scripts.build:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && npx graph build
scripts.prepare:gnosis: ts-node bin/build-subgraph.ts gnosis && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare:mainnet: ts-node bin/build-subgraph.ts mainnet && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy: npm run prepare:gnosis && npm run deploy:gnosis && npm run prepare:mainnet && npm run deploy:mainnet
scripts.deploy:gnosis: npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ swaprhq/stackly subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: npx graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ swaprhq/stackly-ethereum subgraph.yaml
scripts.deploy-local: npx graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 swaprhq/stackly
